Privacy Policy

Last Updated: December 2025

At Heirloom, we take your privacy seriously. Your family's stories and memories are deeply personal, and we're committed to protecting them.

Information We Collect

We collect information you provide directly to us, including:

  • Account information (email, name)
  • Content you create (recordings, photos, stories)
  • Usage data to improve our service

How We Use Your Information

Your information is used solely to provide and improve the Heirloom service. We never sell your personal data or family content to third parties.

Data Security

We use bank-level encryption to protect your data both in transit and at rest. Your family's content is stored securely and accessible only to you and the family members you choose to share with.

Contact Us

If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@theheirloom.site.

This is a placeholder privacy policy. A complete policy will be published before the app launches.
